snippet: Luis Suárez and Neymar played their first match since their memorable exits from the World Cup, with Neymar scoring two goals to help Barcelona rout Mexican champion León, 6-0, in a preseason friendly.
abstract: Barcelona routs Mexican team Leon, 6-0, in preseason friendly at Barcelona's Camp Nou; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Luis Suárez and Neymar played their first match since their memorable exits from the World Cup, with Neymar scoring two goals to help Barcelona rout Mexican champion León, 6-0, in a preseason friendly.

headline.main: Neymar and Barcelona Upend Suárez and León
headline.print_headline: Neymar and Barcelona Upend Suárez and León
